title: Diamond and Gemstone Floral Haaram Set with Jhumkas
materials: 22K Gold Plating. Adorned with CZ diamonds
Ruby Red and Emerald Green synthetic stones. Features hanging freshwater pearls. Showcases the intricate Hyderabadi polish
features: This enchanting Haaram set boasts an intricate floral design, meticulously crafted with sparkling CZ diamonds. The necklace features a central pendant with a ruby red synthetic stone surrounded by elaborate detailing, complemented by delicate emerald green accents. The accompanying Jhumka earrings echo the necklace's floral motif and feature freshwater pearl drops, adding a touch of classic elegance. The necklace showcases a modern chain that connects the intricate floral design seamlessly.
colors: with vibrant ruby red and emerald green gemstones. The freshwater pearls offer a soft
occasions: or any special celebration. A timeless addition to bridal jewelry collections.
description: This Haaram set is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The intricate floral patterns and vibrant gemstones add a regal touch, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine. The inclusion of both a necklace and matching earrings offers exceptional value and versatility. Makes a stunning statement piece that's sure to become a treasured heirloom.
